content.raw:
Some things that Carlos and I noticed in testing:

* The transmitter's data volume is too great for the Topic Visualizer text widget.  If you try to visualize the `/gazebo/default/wirelessTransmitter/link/wirelessTransmitter/transceiver` (or equivalent) topic in the GUI, Gazebo becomes unresponsive (doesn't crash, just gets very slow).
* The shadow cast by an box obstacle in the visualized propagation field looks wrong.  The shadow itself might be the right shape, but it looks like it's in the wrong location.  I'll try to attach a screenshot demonstrating the issue.
* Sometimes, when deleting a transmitter or receiver, Gazebo exits.  It looks like a clean exit, not an uncaught signal or exception.  Not sure what's going on there.

Some things that Carlos and I noticed in testing:

  • The transmitter's data volume is too great for the Topic Visualizer text widget. If you try to visualize the /gazebo/default/wirelessTransmitter/link/wirelessTransmitter/transceiver (or equivalent) topic in the GUI, Gazebo becomes unresponsive (doesn't crash, just gets very slow).
  • The shadow cast by an box obstacle in the visualized propagation field looks wrong. The shadow itself might be the right shape, but it looks like it's in the wrong location. I'll try to attach a screenshot demonstrating the issue.
  • Sometimes, when deleting a transmitter or receiver, Gazebo exits. It looks like a clean exit, not an uncaught signal or exception. Not sure what's going on there.
